PAD_DoorOpened.synopsis: Players react to the door opening.
PAD_DoorOpened.how_to_trigger: Plays when the hidden door to the Lathander gauntlet opens after players solve the statues puzzle nearS_CRE_LathanderStatue_Plaque_East_cda583e5-0e23-4020-bae1-f968538123bf

AD_West.synopsis: Inscription at the bottom of a Lathander statue, indicating which direction the player is supposed to rotate it.

PAD_HitWeakly.synopsis: PAD played when the palyer hits the rusted statue but not hard enough to unstick it.

PAD_AthleticsCheckFailed.synopsis: PAD spoken when the player fails the athletics check to rotate the statue.
PAD_AthleticsCheckFailed.how_to_trigger: Click on S_CRE_LathanderStatue_Sunset_4bb6dfc7-c5ad-474b-b4b6-a265d82c4cba and fail the athetics check

AD_StuckStatue.synopsis: The rusted statue makes grinding noises as you attempt to rotate it.

PAD_SpottingStatuesPerceptionCheck.synopsis: The player spots a set of statues that might be more movable than they first appear - and can be tipped off by a book in the monastery that bypasses the perception check.
PAD_SpottingStatuesPerceptionCheck.how_to_trigger: To trigger: walk to -68; 0; -68 in the Upper Gith Creche, as you approach the statues the PAD triggers

AD_East.synopsis: Inscription at the bottom of a Lathander statue, indicating which direction the player is supposed to rotate it.

PAD_DoorOpened_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DoorOpened_0.text: The statues revealed a hidden door... Curious.

AD_West_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_West_0.text: *Lathander bids the setting sun a fond farewell.*

PAD_AthleticsCheckFailed_0.speaker: Player
PAD_AthleticsCheckFailed_0.text: Damn thing is jammed shut. Won't turn like this.

AD_StuckStatue_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_StuckStatue_0.text: *The statue starts to rotate, but its rusty mechanism jams stuck.*

PAD_SpottingStatuesPerceptionCheck_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SpottingStatuesPerceptionCheck_0.text: Hmm, some strange grooves by the statues... I wonder if they can be moved?

PAD_SpottingStatuesPerceptionCheck_1.speaker: Player
PAD_SpottingStatuesPerceptionCheck_1.text: Huh, that book mentioned Lathander statues that moved...
